column6:
Variation to the Purchase Order (iLAB-PO000005701) awarded
to ABX Advanced Biochemical Compounds for the supply of
Conical Column Reservoir 10 ml
column8:
At the time of obtaining the quotation, the freight charges were not included.
On the 17th of February 2023, the goods were delivered, and upon receiving
them, they included freight charges on their invoice.
They have added additional costs for airfreight, hence the increase.

to receive the disposal authorities from NARSSA and ensure continuous
provision of services

column5: Universal Service and Access Agency of South Africa
column6:
Appointment of Sentech for variation of the project scope to
assemble and package 270 000 loose DHT Satelite Dish
components.
column8:
1. Shortage of DTH Satellite Dish Kits for BDM project. This was
exercibated by the high demand for such in the rural areas where
antennae signal is very week. Without these components, the project
will be significatly interrupted and thereby worsen the delays in the
completion of the project and release of spectrum.
2. Sentech was already appointed to deplete the same stock and is the
entity approved through the funding model to install and deplete the
current STBs warehoused at SAPO.
3. The assembly was not included in the initial contract to install the
remaining STBs.
column15:
Upon completion of the project as
agreed by both parties

column5: Universal Service and Access Agency of South Africa
column6:
Appointment of Sentech as a service provider for After market
support
column8:
1. SABC was supposed to carry this service and they dropped out of
this contract due to lack of capacity to deliver. They wrote to the
Minister indicating that they are not able to crry out this task/project.
2. Due to the pace at which the project was going and considering that
Sentech had provided this service in the previous financial year,
Sentech was approached to assist with this and they have responded
positively. They already have a facility to carry out the after-market
services from their call centre. There was therefore no need for
USAASA to spend significant portion of USAF budget on funding the
establishment of a new facility.

column6: CONFERENCING AND EVENTS MANAGEMENT
column8:
entral Category Management finalized the Sourcing Strategy and Request for
Proposal (RFP), and issued the RFP to the open market on 25 August 2022.
The RFP closed on 23 September 2022.
Transnet received 28 bid responses on the Transnet e-tender portal by
closing date. Transnet is currently finalising the Bid Evaluation Committee
members appointments to evaluate the bids and will require more time to
finalise the total evaluation process until award. It will not be possible to
conclude the procurement process by 31 October 2022.
Transnet will not have a Conferencing and Events Management Service
Provider to manage the following critical TCC Conferencing and Events for
the next four months
